languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт задумывается и коротко кивает — скорее себе, чем вам.{/n} "Твой вид чувствителен к истине. Я буду напоминать себе об этом".
{n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт задумывается и коротко кивает — скорее себе, чем вам.{/n} "Твой вид чувствителен к истине. Я буду напоминать себе об этом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet thinks, then gives you a nod — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your kin is sensitive to truth. I will have to remind myself of that."
{n}Yrliet thinks, then gives you a nod — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your kin is sensitive to truth. I will have to remind myself of that."
{n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."
{n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."
{n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特思忖片刻，点了点头。但与其说是在对你点头，不如说她是在对自己点头。{/n}“你们人类听不得实话，我会记住这一点的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特思忖片刻，点了点头。但与其说是在对你点头，不如说她是在对自己点头。{/n}“你们人类听不得实话，我会记住这一点的。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sopesa tus palabras y luego asiente con la cabeza, más para sí misma que para ti.{/n} «Tu especie es sensible a la franqueza. Tendré que recordarlo».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sopesa tus palabras y luego asiente con la cabeza, más para sí misma que para ti.{/n} «Tu especie es sensible a la franqueza. Tendré que recordarlo».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet réfléchit un instant et hoche la tête, davantage pour elle-même que pour vous.{/n} « Votre espèce est particulièrement sensible à la vérité. Il faut que je m'en souvienne. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet réfléchit un instant et hoche la tête, davantage pour elle-même que pour vous.{/n} « Votre espèce est particulièrement sensible à la vérité. Il faut que je m'en souvienne. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet denkt darüber nach und nickt dann – mehr für sich selbst als für dich.{/n} "Eure Spezies ist empfindlich, was die Wahrheit betrifft. Ich werde das berücksichtigen müssen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet denkt darüber nach und nickt dann – mehr für sich selbst als für dich.{/n} "Eure Spezies ist empfindlich, was die Wahrheit betrifft. Ich werde das berücksichtigen müssen."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはそのことについて考えてからうなずいた。だが、それはどちらかというとあなたにではなく、自分に対してのものだった。{/n}「お前の種族は真実に敏感だ。そのことを忘れてはならないようだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはそのことについて考えてからうなずいた。だが、それはどちらかというとあなたにではなく、自分に対してのものだった。{/n}「お前の種族は真実に敏感だ。そのことを忘れてはならないようだな」

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, düşünüp başını sallıyor. Bunu sana bir cevap olarak değil, kendi kendine yapıyor.{/n} "Türün hakikate karşı hassas. Bunu aklımdan çıkarmamalıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet considers this, then nods — more to herself than to you.{/n} "Your species is sensitive to the truth. I will have to remember that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet düşünüp başını sallıyor. Bunu sana bir cevap olarak değil, kendi kendine yapıyor.{/n} "Senin türün hakikate karşı hassas. Bunu aklımdan çıkarmamalıyım."
